Token.Abstract: Loops through the dictionary and executes the given block using each item.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block that performs an action using a key/value pair.

Token.Abstract: Enumerates through the dictionary concurrently and executes the given block once for each pair.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block that performs an action using a key/value pair.

Token.Abstract: Loops through a dictionary to find the first key/value pair matching the block.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL-returning code block for a key/value pair.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The value of the first pair found;

Token.Abstract: Loops through a dictionary to find the key/value pairs matching the block.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL-returning code block for a key/value pair.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a dictionary of the objects found.

Token.Abstract: Loops through a dictionary to find the key/value pairs not matching the block.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL-returning code block for a key/value pair.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a dictionary of all objects not found.

Token.Abstract: Call the block once for each object and create a dictionary with the same keys and a new set of values.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block that returns a new value for a key/value pair.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a dictionary of the objects returned by the block.

Token.Abstract: Loops through a dictionary to find whether any key/value pair matches the block.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES for the first time the block returns YES for a key/value pair, NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Loops through a dictionary to find whether no key/value pairs match the block.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the block returns NO for all key/value pairs in the dictionary, NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Loops through a dictionary to find whether all key/value pairs match the block.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the block returns YES for all key/value pairs in the dictionary, NO otherwise.
